### ID mapping

```{bash}
http --pretty format 'https://api.omicidx.cancerdatasci.org/sra/runs' \
    'size==3' \
	'include_fields==accession' \
	'include_fields==experiment.accession' \
	'include_fields==study.accession' \
	'include_fields==sample.accession' 

```
